info.title: Todo App Backend API's Specification
info.description: To-Do List are prioritized lists of all the tasks that you need to carry out. They list everything that you have to do, with the most important tasks at the top of the list, and the least important tasks at the bottom.

tags.name: Navigation Bar
tags.description: Basic Navigation Bar to Access Content

parameters.name: fullName
parameters.description: Provide Full name . e.g. John

parameters.name: emailID
parameters.description: Provide a valid email address to authenticate. e.g. your@some-domain.com

parameters.name: mobile
parameters.description: Provide a valid Mobile Number to authenticate. e.g. 99XXXXXXXX

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: Provide a valid Password

post.description: It authenticates the user email from company database and it returns success response with email and token. For every REST call you need to pass token and crossponding email with some extra request body which is based on REST call's

parameters.name: emailID
parameters.description: Provide a valid email address to authenticate. e.g. your@some-domain.com

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: Provide a valid Password

message.example: Loging Successfully via Email and Password Authentcation
Logging Unsuccessfull Due to Authentcation failure

post.description: It authenticates the user from Registered Facebook user information and it returns success response with email and token. For every REST call you need to pass token and crossponding email with some extra request body which is based on REST call's

parameters.name: secret key
parameters.description: Take Secret Code from Already registered facebook  user to authenticate. e.g. XXXXXXX

parameters.name: client Id
parameters.description: Take Corresponding Facebook User Id

parameters.name: title
parameters.title: formData
parameters.description: Title is required to differentiate bewtween one ToDo to Another ToDo

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: formData

message.example: New ToDo Item is Added Successfully

put.description: Update the ToDo details e.g. title, description etc

parameters.name: toDoID
parameters.description: Valid ToDo ID will update the ToDo details

parameters.name: x-token
parameters.description: Token needs to be validated for every request.

example: Failed to fetch the ToDo Item

get.description: Display the ToDo Items that is Completed Today.

parameters.name: toDoID
parameters.toDoID: ToDo Id to find particular ToDo items

parameters.name: x-token
parameters.description: Token needs to be validated for every request.

200.description: Displaying All ToDo Items which is Completed Today.

401.description: Failed to Display Today's ToDo Items

message.example: Error in Displaying Today's Completed ToDo Item

parameters.name: toDoID
parameters.toDoID: ToDo Id to find particular Task

parameters.name: x-token
parameters.description: Token needs to be validated for every request.

200.description: Displaying All task assign for today.

message.example: Displaying All Task Assign for Today's Successfully

401.description: Failed to display All task assign for today

parameters.name: toDoID

parameters.name: x-token
